definition: having or resembling chelae or claws, a heterocyclic compound having a metal ion attached by coordinate bonds to at least two nonmetal ions, to form a chelate, in chemistry
details:
adjective
- having or resembling chelae or claws
- relating to or characterized by chelation
= synonyms: chelated
noun
- a heterocyclic compound having a metal ion attached by coordinate bonds to at least two nonmetal ions
= synonyms: chelate compound
verb
- to form a chelate, in chemistry
